actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Jeffords under authority of the order of the Senate of 10/17/2002 without amendment. With written report No. 107-326.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 743.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for flood control, Little Calumet River, Indiana.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to construct the flood control project for Little Calumet River in Indiana substantially in accordance with the post-authorization change report of the Corps of Engineers dated August 2000.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for flood control, Little Calumet River, Indiana.
